item.title: Memory Forensics
item.description: Volatility linkVolatility is an useful tool for memory forensics. If you use a Debian based operating system, you can install using apt. sudo apt install volatility3 # Confirm if download successfully vol -h However, itâ€™s recommended to download it from the GitHub repository if you want the latest stable version. Target: Windows link # Determine the operating system python3 vol.py -f example.vmem windows.info # Dump password hashes python3 vol.py -f example.
